title: Whispering Pines Cottages
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, Whispering Pines Cottages is set in Amsterdam, 2.1 km from Artis Zoo and 2.8 km from Royal Theater Carré. The property is situated 3.2 km from Rembrandt House, 3.2 km from Dutch National Opera & Ballet and 3.3 km from Heineken Experience. The aparthotel features family rooms. All units in the aparthotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the aparthotel also offer free WiFi, while some rooms also offer a balcony. At the aparthotel, units come with bed linen and towels. Amsterdam RAI is 3.6 km from the aparthotel, while Rijksmuseum is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 15 km from Whispering Pines Cottages.

title: Veluvana Bali - Owl Bamboo House
description: Veluvana is a unique bamboo house with a wonderful view of Sidemen Valley, a genuine tropical landscape with Mount Agung peak on its back. This getaway spot is a great place to bring into reality the dream adventure of the true wanderer. We invite you to feel the magnificent vibes of the entire house to escape the life that is full of drama into a journey with ultimate joy. The bamboo house is located at the main tourist district of Sidemen, a small town with a magnificent landscape in the southern flank of Mount Agung. Sidemen is not a touristy area, it is about a 90-minute drive from Bali Airport and a 45-minute drive from Ubud. Besides the beautiful scenery and the indigenous culture Sidemen also surrounded by a lot of famous tourist destinations in Bali. Some of them include; Lempuyang Temple (The Gateway to Heaven), Besakih (The Mother Temple of Bali), Tirta Gangga Royal Water Palace, Telaga Waja River for Rafting, Amed Diving Spot, and Bias Putih the Virgin Beach.

reviews.name: Michael Chen
reviews.good: Amazing rooftop bar with stunning views.
reviews.bad: Noise from the street could be bothersome.
